'''Radiant Spincrystal 119''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Songe de la plus haute tour]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in one of the overhangs of the [[Tower of Ipsissimus]] before and after completing the {{Quest|In the Wake of Narcissus}}, it is also available in a similar location when the tower sinks into the ocean.
